summary:
With over 25 years of experience in various commercial roles, I am a seasoned business development manager with a passion for driving innovation and customer success. I currently work with Nilan, a leading provider of premium-quality, energy-saving ventilation and heat pump solutions, and Profila, a visionary personal data and permission marketing platform that prioritizes privacy and empowers customers.

I leverage my project management, problem-solving, and business development expertise to exceed critical targets and performance goals, and to create lasting business relationships across diverse industries and markets. I also build, develop, and motivate top-performing multinational and multi-lingual teams that share my commitment to sustainability, quality, efficiency, and profitability. I thrive in an intellectually challenging and innovative environment, where I can learn new technologies and drive positive change.
